name: BioniX Wallpaper Playlist File
summary: Learn about .BIONIX files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: BioniX can specify the frequency at which the background changes as well as whether to shuffle the playlists or play them in order.

description: Playlist file created by BioniX Wallpaper, a program used for changing desktop backgrounds; contains a list of desktop background images that can be rotated through at periodic intervals, based on the program settings.
